phrs.translation: 一抱之量, 一抱, 两臂合围的量

sentences.sentence: He hurried out with an armful of brochures.
sentences.translation: 他抱着一摞小册子匆忙出去了。

sentences.sentence: Anne, who was bringing an armful of flowers into the kitchen, saw his face too.
sentences.translation: 安妮刚刚抱着一捧花走进厨房，她也看到了马修的脸。

sentences.sentence: He persevered with his task until he had succeeded in collecting an armful of firewood.
sentences.translation: 他坚守着他的目标，直到成功收集了一抱木柴。
